is the holy grail of the third-generation of Corvette. The legendary LS6 Corvette Stingray is a king amongst the car collectors and it received the National Corvette Restorers' Society Top Flight Award, The engine was also verified as original by a leading expert of Chevy Corvette big block engines.
Stealing the whole show, the engine has 454 cubic inches of brute and makes 425-horsepower - aka a whole lot for
! In addition to the engine, the options this particular Corvette came with make it even more valuable. Corvettes like this come around very often, and when they do, it's time to pounce.
Dream Giveaway is offering anyone with as little as three bucks a chance to own this fully-restored
LS6 Chevy Big Block. In addition to winning the car, they'll also pay $42,000 to cover taxes for the winner.
